reviews.review_msg: Good guy, very helpful and pleasant to converse with. However, completely disorganized, always, always late and the class notes are half useless. He spends too much time on subjects he enjoys instead of the necessary ones. As well, he falls behind in lectures because he's 5-20 min late every class.
Terrific prof: he's incredibly passionate about what he's teaching, he makes the material interesting and cares about whether you get the material or not. Highly recommended.
Amazing guy. Seems super interested in the subject of the Middle East and has a lot of knowledge. Take a class with him!
Unjustifiably tough grader. TA's are horrible. Never again.
